Purpose: Comprehensive assessment of semen volume, concentration, motility, vitality, and morphology (Kruger criteria) to evaluate male fertility.
Container: Clean, sterile, wide-mouth specimen container without additives or lubricants
Equipment: Centrifuge, microscope (x10/x100 oil immersion), Makler or improved Neubauer counting chamber, leukocytometer, staining supplies (Giemsa or Diff-Quik), pipettes, counting slides, timer
